com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.model
Class HostOverviewFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.model.ModelFactory<HostOverview,Host>
      com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.model.HostOverviewFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelProvider<HostOverview,Host>
public final class HostOverviewFactory
extends ModelFactory<HostOverview,Host>
implements ModelProvider<HostOverview,Host>

The HostOverviewFactory class is a factory class for getting the HostOverview representation for the Host.

Author:
Tomas Hurka

Method Detail

getDefault

public static HostOverviewFactory getDefault()
Getter for the default version of the HostOverviewFactory.

Returns:
instance of HostOverviewFactory.

getSystemOverviewFor

public static HostOverview getSystemOverviewFor(Host host)
Factory method for obtaining HostOverview for Host. Note that there is only one instance of HostOverview for a concrete application. This HostOverview instance is cached. This method can return null if there is no HostOverview available

Parameters:
host - host
Returns:
HostOverview instance or null if there is no HostOverview

createModelFor

public HostOverview createModelFor(Host host)
Default ModelProvider implementation, which creates HostOverview for localhost. If you want to extend HostOverviewFactory use HostOverviewFactory#registerProvider() to register the new instances of ModelProvider for the different types of Host.

Specified by:
createModelFor in interface ModelProvider<HostOverview,Host>
Parameters:
host - host
Returns:
instance of HostOverview for localhost
